About Us

Apostil, Inc. is a modern document authentication service helping individuals and companies obtain apostilles, notarizations, and legalizations quickly and reliably across all 50 states.

From notary to court certification to U.S. Department of State Apostille - we handle the entire process. Whether you're sending a diploma abroad or managing legal documents for your firm, we take care of everything. Our team combines legal expertise with operational efficiency to deliver fast, secure, and transparent apostille services.

Why Choose Us:

We value clear communication, client education, and a proactive approach to problem-solving. Through our innovative AI technology, responsive customer service, and personalized support, we help our clients achieve international compliance with confidence.
